name: ramadan-calendar-backend
description: Backend server for Ramadan Calendar PWA - Web Push Notifications

scripts.generate-vapid: node -e "const webpush = require('web-push'); const keys = webpush.generateVAPIDKeys(); console.log('VAPID_PUBLIC_KEY=' + keys.publicKey); console.log('VAPID_PRIVATE_KEY=' + keys.privateKey);"
